Made from fermented milk. With high energy and limitless possibilities, it's used in a wide range of dishes.
Milk must be processed first to be made into Cheese.

chilled_meat.Name: Chilled Meat
chilled_meat.Description:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

coffee_beans.Name: Coffee Beans
coffee_beans.Description: A common food in Teyvat with a special aroma. It can be used to make beverages after being ground.

crab.Name: Crab
crab.Description: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

crab_roe.Name: Crab Roe
crab_roe.Description: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

cream.Name: Cream
cream.Description: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

eel_meat.Name: Eel Meat
eel_meat.Description: The fresh meat of an Unagi/Eel. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

fermented_juice.Name: Fermented Juice
fermented_juice.Description: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

fish.Name: Fish
fish.Description: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled correctly it can make a rich dish.

flour.Name: Flour
flour.Description: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner. Wheat must be processed first to be made into Flour.

fowl.Name: Fowl
fowl.Description: A fresh bird. Handled correctly it can make a hearty meal.

glabrous_beans.Name: Glabrous Beans
glabrous_beans.Description: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

ham.Name: Ham
ham.Description:
Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.
Meat must be processed first to be made into Ham.

harra_fruit.Name: Harra Fruit
harra_fruit.Description: Growing in the hot humid rainforest, it is a fruit with a special spicy aroma. When ground to powder, spices can be made from it. It is the most valued spice plant in Sumeru.

horsetail.Name: Horsetail
horsetail.Description: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

jam.Name: Jam
jam.Description: A puree made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up drowsy taste buds. Apples and Berries must be processed first to be made into Jam.

lavender_melon.Name: Lavender Melon
lavender_melon.Description: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

lotus_head.Name: Lotus Head
lotus_head.Description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

marcotte.Name: Marcotte
marcotte.Description: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

matsutake.Name: Matsutake
matsutake.Description: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

milk.Name: Milk
milk.Description: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

mint.Name: Mint
mint.Description: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

mushroom.Name: Mushroom
mushroom.Description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

mysterious_meat.Name: Mysterious Meat
mysterious_meat.Description: A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?

mysterious_meat_product.Name: Mysterious Meat Product
mysterious_meat_product.Description: The mysterious meat can become something a lot more ordinary once specially processed.

onion.Name: Onion
onion.Description: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

pepper.Name: Pepper
pepper.Description: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

pinecone.Name: Pinecone
pinecone.Description: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

potato.Name: Potato
potato.Description: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

radish.Name: Radish
radish.Description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

raw_meat.Name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.Description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly it can be used to make delicious food.

rice.Name: Rice
rice.Description: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

salt.Name: Salt
salt.Description: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

sausage.Name: Sausage
sausage.Description:
Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.
Meat must be processed first to be made into Sausages.

seagrass.Name: Seagrass
seagrass.Description: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

shrimp_meat.Name: Shrimp Meat
shrimp_meat.Description: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

smoked_fowl.Name: Smoked Fowl
smoked_fowl.Description:
Fowl that has been smoked. The firm texture gives new taste to dishes.
Fowl must be processed first to be made into Smoked Fowl.

snapdragon.Name: Snapdragon
snapdragon.Description: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

spice.Name: Spice
spice.Description: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

sugar.Name: Sugar
sugar.Description:
A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.
Can be purchased from the merchants in the city, or made with Sweet Flowers.

sumeru_rose.Name: Sumeru Rose
sumeru_rose.Description: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this type of “rambler rose,” its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

sweet_flower.Name: Sweet Flower
sweet_flower.Description: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

tidalga.Name: Tidalga
tidalga.Description: An algae floating with the tides that sustains itself by feeding on substances produced by other plants. Though often mistaken for zooplankton, based on its nature, Tidalga is actually a type of phytoplankton.

tofu.Name: Tofu
tofu.Description: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

tomato.Name: Tomato
tomato.Description: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the 'fruit or vegetable' debate is still going...

wheat.Name: Wheat
wheat.Description: Golden sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

zaytun_peach.Name: Zaytun Peach
zaytun_peach.Description: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

butterfly_wings.Name: Butterfly Wings
butterfly_wings.Description: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

crystal_core.Name: Crystal Core
crystal_core.Description: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that had escaped into the atmosphere.

electro_crystal.Name: Electro Crystal
electro_crystal.Description: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

flaming_flower_stamen.Name: Flaming Flower Stamen
flaming_flower_stamen.Description: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

frog.Name: Frog
frog.Description: Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

lizard_tail.Name: Lizard Tail
lizard_tail.Description: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

loach_pearl.Name: Loach Pearl
loach_pearl.Description:
A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties.
Minerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

luminescent_spine.Name: Luminescent Spine
luminescent_spine.Description: The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.

mist_flower_corolla.Name: Mist Flower Corolla
mist_flower_corolla.Description: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

strange_tooth.Name: Strange Tooth
strange_tooth.Description: A Dragontooth you picked up in Dragonspine. Perhaps someone would know something more about it...

vitalized_dragontooth.Name: Vitalized Dragontooth
vitalized_dragontooth.Description: A Dragontooth that has absorbed vitality and now exudes a warmth that-makes one uneasy. Once upon a time, a dragon fell to ruin in a silver valley, painting the bone-white snow an ominous crimson. This crimson symbolizes the might of this dragon.

dust_of_azoth.Name: Dust of Azoth
dust_of_azoth.Description:
A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.
Its practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines.
It is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

dream_solvent.Name: Dream Solvent
dream_solvent.Description: An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.

memory_of_roving_gales.Name: Memory of Roving Gales
memory_of_roving_gales.Description: The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.

memory_of_immovable_crystals.Name: Memory of Immovable Crystals
memory_of_immovable_crystals.Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Geo-aligned Traveler.

memory_of_violet_flash.Name: Memory of Violet Flash
memory_of_violet_flash.Description: The missing star from the Talents of an Electro-aligned Traveler.

memory_of_flourishing_green.Name: Memory of Flourishing Green
memory_of_flourishing_green.Description: The missing star from the Talents of an Dendro-aligned Traveler.
